subject: English

contentStandard.main: 4.2 Communicate with appropriate language, form and style

learningStandard.component: 1.1.4 Understand independently longer sequences of classroom instructions

preActivity: Students will engage in a short discussion on cultural experiences and share their thoughts.
activity: In pairs, students will write a dialogue related to the topic using proper language and format.
postActivity: Groups will present their dialogues and reflect on how language helps express culture.
objective: Students will be able to use language effectively to talk about cultural experiences and write simple dialogues.
successCriteria: Students demonstrate correct structure, appropriate vocabulary, and active participation in discussions.

subject: English

contentStandard.component: 2.1 Communicate information, ideas, opinions and feelings intelligibly on familiar topics

learningStandard.main: 2.3.1 Keep interaction going in discourse-level exchanges by paraphrasing and rephrasing appropriately
learningStandard.component: 2.1.1 Explain information on familiar topics from diagrams, charts, tables, graphs or other visuals

objective: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to communicate main ideas and details in order to complete the tasks given.
successCriteria: Ask and answer 3 questions based on the questions with a partner. Talk ideas in mind map using at least 3 expressions given.
preActivity: Introducing topic for today’s lesson & stating lesson objectives.
activity: 1. Introducing topic for today’s lesson & stating lesson objectives. 2. Pupils ask and answer 3 questions with a partner. 3. Pupils talk ideas in mind map using the expressions given.

objective: By the end of the lesson, pupils will be able to communicate information and details in order to complete the task.
successCriteria: Read and tick at least 4/8 sentences in order to correct the order. Read and decide at least 3/5 answers to decide True/False for the statements given.
